topic.title: Syntax Highlight Not Available in Eclipse Plugin

section.title: Problem
section.p: I associated the .ext extension with in Eclipse. Why does an .ext file opened with the plugin not have syntax highlight?

section.title: Solution
section.p:
Associating an extension with in Eclipse versions requires three steps:
Associate the .ext extension with the plugin..
and go to General Editors File Associations .
Add *.ext to the list of file types.
Select *.ext in the list by clicking it.
Add to the list of Associated editors and make it the default editor..
Associate the .ext extension with the Oxygen XML content type.
and go to General Content Types .
Add *.ext to the File associations list for the Text XML
content type.
Press the OK button in the Eclipse preferences dialog box.
Result: Now when an *.ext file is opened the icon of the editor and the syntax highlight should be the same as for XML files opened with the plugin.
